text: allah oka upamanam iccadu: Okadu banisaga itaruni yajaman'yanlo unnavadu. Atadu e vidhamaina adhikaram leni vadu, marokadu ma nundi manci jivanopadhi pondina vadu. Atadu danilo nundi rahasyanganu mariyu bahiranganganu kharcu ceyagala vadu. Emi? Viriddaru samanulavutara? Sarvastotralaku ar'hudu kevalam allah matrame! Kani, cala mandiki idi teliyadu
